job_title: AWS with API Technical Lead / Architect
jd: From: Gokulraj R, Exaways corporationTitle: AWS with API Technical Lead Contract: $80/$Hr on C2C Onsite role in Alameda, CA- Long term contract Experience should be in b/w 12-19 Years gokul.raj@exaways.com Reply to: gokul.raj@exaways.com Hi,I hope you are doing well,This is Gokul Raj from Exaways Corporation. We have an urgent requirement for the position below, If you are interested, kindly send me your updated resume, contact details and a convenient time to talk to youTitle: AWS with API Technical Lead / ArchitectMode of Hiring: ContractOnsite role in Alameda, CA- Long term contractExperience should be in b/w 12-19 Years JD/Description of Role:Job Overview:As an API / Solutions Architect, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining complex API solutions that meet the requirements as well as adhere to established architectural principles, standards, and patterns. He / She will collaborate closely with cloud engineering platform team to work on API and Devops tools. He / she will collaborate with software developers, system architects, product managers, and stakeholders, to ensure APIs are robust, scalable, and secure.Mandatory Skills :Total IT 13+ YearsMinimum : 5 Years AWS Cloud ExperienceAWS API GatewayAWS LambdaAble to write Lambda functions using PythonPrimary (Must have skills):Key Responsibilities:1. API Design and Development:o Lead the design and development of APIs that enable integration between various AWS componentso Define API standards, best practices, and guidelines to ensure consistency across APIs.2. Architectural Guidance:o Provide reviews on present AWS architecture implementation ando Provide technical leadership and guidance on API architecture, design decisions, and implementation strategies.o Collaborate with solution architects and development teams to integrate API solutions into larger systems or platforms.3. Technologies and Frameworks:o Use of Okta for authentication make use of CSRF and Access tokenso Knowledge of aws well architected framework pillars4. Performance and Scalability:o Design APIs with a focus on performance, scalability, reliability, and security.o Conduct performance tuning and optimization of APIs to handle high traffic and large volumes of data.5. Security and Compliance:o Implement security measures such as authentication, authorization, encryption, and data protection mechanisms in APIs.o Understand AWS SSO API working and cross role working across accounts6. Continuous Improvement:o Stay updated on emerging technologies, industry trends, and best practices related to APIs and integration.o Drive initiatives for continuous improvement of API development processes, tools, and methodologies.
